br.com.caelum.vraptor.http.route

Class PathAnnotationRoutesParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.caelum.vraptor.http.route.PathAnnotationRoutesParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RoutesParser

    @ApplicationScoped
public class PathAnnotationRoutesParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements RoutesParser
    The default parser routes creator uses the path annotation to create rules. Note that methods are only registered to be public accessible if the type is annotated with @Controller. If you want to override the convention for default URI, you can create a class like: public class MyRoutesParser extends PathAnnotationRoutesParser { //delegate constructor protected String extractControllerNameFrom(Class<?> type) { return //your convention here } protected String defaultUriFor(String controllerName, String methodName) { return //your convention here } }
    Author:
    Guilherme Silveira, Lucas Cavalcanti
